original: Christensson, Margot, läroverksadjunkt, Eksjö, f. 5/12/02 i V. Alstad, Malmöh. L, av disp. Lars C. o. Maria Christensson. — Stud:ex. v. Lunds fullst. lärov. f. fl. 21, fil. kand. 26, fik mag. 28, stud. litt. v. univ. i Poitiers o. auék. v. flicklärov. där 30-31, prov-år v. Upps. h. a. 1. 37. Res. t. Tyskl. 27, Engl. 28, Frankr. 30-31, Tyskl. 35, 37 o. 39, Engl. o. Frankr. 37, Schweiz 39. Vik. ämneslär. v. T. Åbergs sk. 32, e. o. ämneslär. v. Hälsingborgs h. elem:sk. f. fl 32-33, timlär. i Vellinge 33-34, vik. ämneslär. där 33, timlär. där 34, vik. adj. i Norrköp. 34, ’timlär. v. Gbgs samisk. 35, vik. adj. i Kalmar 35-36, vik. ämneslär. i Strömsnäsbruk 36, e. o. adj. i Västerås 38-39, adj. i tyska, eng. o. franska v. Eksjö h. a. 1. sed. 39.
translated: Christensson, Margot, high school teacher, Eksjö, b. 5/12/02 in V. Alstad, Malmöh. Daughter of dispenser Lars C. and Maria Christensson. She graduated from Lund Fullständiga Lärovärk in 1921, received a Bachelor of Arts degree in 1926, a Master of Fine Arts degree in 1928. She studied literature at the University in Poitiers and attended a girls' school there from 1930-1931. She did a probationary year at Uppsala high school in 1937. She traveled to Germany in 1927, to England in 1928, to France in 1930-1931, to Germany in 1935, 1937, and 1939, to England and France in 1937, and to Switzerland in 1939. She was a substitute subject teacher at T. Åberg's school in 1932 and temporary subject teacher at the Hälsingborg elementary school from 1932-1933. She was a part-time teacher in Vellinge from 1933-1934, substitute subject teacher there in 1933 and part-time teacher there in 1934. She was a substitute teacher in Norrköping in 1934, a part-time teacher at Gbg's Sami School in 1935, a substitute teacher in Kalmar from 1935-1936 and substitute subject teacher in Strömsnäsbruk in 1936. She was a temporary assistant teacher in Västerås from 1938-1939 and language teacher in German, English, and French at Eksjö h. a. 1. since 1939.
